messageRules.title: Welcome to Zenefits
messageRules.content: Can I help you with any of the following features of zenefits? You can get back to this menu by typing 'help' anytime during the chat. Or, want to talk to an agent? try 'agent'

subsections.title: COBRA
subsections.content: Cover them even after their leaving

subsections.title: Ben Admin
subsections.content: It's okay if you want to keep your own broker

subsections.title: HR Management
subsections.content: After all Zenefits is a HR Management Service

subsections.title: PTO
subsections.content: Paid-Time Off is good for restoring energy

subsections.title: Tax
subsections.content: Use Zen PYP, file tax easily

subsections.title: Zenefits PYP
subsections.content: Try new Zenefits Payroll product PYP, All-in-one experience makes life easier

subsections.title: Payroll Sync
subsections.content: Have your own payroll provider? No problem! Zenefits provide payroll sync.

subsections.title: Account
subsections.content: Anything wrong with your account login? Talk to our tech support to unblock you in no time!

subsections.title: Billing
subsections.content: Lets correct it up! Talk to one of our agent to set things straight
